definitions.definition: A kind of jam made with citrus fruit , distinguished by being made slightly bitter by the addition of the peel and by partial caramelisation during manufacture. Most commonly made with Seville oranges , and usually qualified by the name of the fruit when made with other types of fruit.
A cat having orange - or ginger -colored fur .

main_definition: A kind of jam made with citrus fruit , distinguished by being made slightly bitter by the addition of the peel and by partial caramelisation during manufacture. Most commonly made with Seville oranges , and usually qualified by the name of the fruit when made with other types of fruit. [from late 15c.]
secondary_definitions: A cat having orange - or ginger -colored fur .
